name: requirejs-esm-preprocessor
description: Preprocessor of JavaScript modules in RequireJS projects converting ESM to AMD.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run demo
scripts.demo: npm run demo:extern && npm run demo:local
scripts.demo:extern: npm run optimize:extern && npm run minify:extern
scripts.minify:extern: terser -cm --ecma 2018 --comments false --source-map content=demo-extern/main-built.js.map --source-map includeSources --source-map url=main-built.min.js.map -o demo-extern/main-built.min.js demo-extern/main-built.js
scripts.demo:local: npm run optimize:local && npm run minify:local
scripts.minify:local: terser -cm --ecma 2018 --comments false --source-map content=demo-local/main-built.js.map --source-map includeSources --source-map url=main-built.min.js.map -o demo-local/main-built.min.js demo-local/main-built.js
scripts.cover: c8 npm run check && c8 --no-clean npm run optimize:local && c8 --no-clean npm run optimize:extern && c8 report -r text -r lcov && c8 check-coverage
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run cover
